title: Lifting Others Up
description:
DeRay talks with Wes Moore about his new role fighting systemic poverty at Robin Hood, #closerikers, and hope. Laura Weidman Powers of Code2040 joins DeRay to discuss the important of diversity in the tech industry and her time in Obama’s White House.

Thanks to our sponsors:

MACK WELDON

mackweldon.com Promo code: PEOPLE

WORDPRESS
